Loved it!  Crazy decor - Paper Mache dolls preside over the bar and eating area.  Staff friendly and attentive to non spanish speaking tourists.  Very delicious Guacamole! - fresh with tomatoes and spices.  Too bad Chips weren't home made too.  Then plate of 4 various corn tacos - the small size - chicken, pork, beef and barbecue with various toppings.  All tasted great - fresh meats - tender and tasty.  Also excellent Daiquiris - frozen too.
